column1: Standing room only for #TeamFitz! Thank you to Karl Rove for joining us this weekend in #PA01 and supporting our campaign! Let’s keep the momentum going! https://t.co/Ka338wZwOg

I am proud to receive the endorsement of the RJC PAC for my reelection. In Congress I will continue my fight to strengthen the relationship between the U.S. and our Jewish community ensuring we stand behind Israel supporting one of our closest allies https://t.co/7QGbOITfvi https://t.co/iz6PpKOHCl
As we gather and celebrate with our friends and families I want to wish you and your family a very Merry Christmas. May your holidays be filled with joy love and peace. https://t.co/xTnDt2BfKF

Thank you to NRCC Chairman @tomemmer and @PAGOP Chairman Lawrence Tabas for supporting our campaign! We are the NRCC’s top priority and we greatly appreciate the strong showing. Thanks to Jim Worthington Pat Deon G.T. Thompson and the PA House delegation for joining us. https://t.co/Gpw74LBlLc

I hope today is a reminder of all the  incredible things in life a time to reflect on and embrace all those who make every day special in our lives. God bless your families your loved ones and each and every one of you. #HappyThanksgiving https://t.co/wizV32tTbf
Just voted! Great to run into my high school classmate and sister of Denise Bowman! https://t.co/Dc3nVt359j

Please come out today to support two great men Rob Loughery and Gene DiGirolamo. They are true leaders who will keep Bucks County a beautiful place to live work and raise our families. They will keep our taxes low preserve our open space and will work to end our opioid crisis https://t.co/sTV6t7j2bo

Message to @hasanthehun: @DanCrenshawTX is my colleague my friend and an American hero. He’s done something you never have: he put his life on the line to defend our nation and protect your free speech rights. Shame on you for attacking an American hero. https://t.co/8ACY6UVobQ

“Conservatives have said antifa activists are a dangerous force. On Wednesday Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick sent a letter to Attorney General William P. Barr asking him to designate antifa activists as domestic terrorists and denounce the attack on Ngo” #PA01 https://t.co/WcIauzgkwD

To those who undermined law enforcement and our American Flag you have undermined yourselves. The American Flag represents those who died abroad defending your freedoms. The Thin Blue Line flag represents those who died at home protecting your families. https://t.co/5GAfulyILG
To each and every one of you from our family to yours Happy Easter. https://t.co/PHzEvfCYwB
